name: Pop Pop The Balloons FREE HD
name_original: Pop Pop The Balloons FREE HD
description:
Pop Pop The Balloons is a cool action game very easy and intuitive to play, but it will be hard to stop playing.

Hit with your finger the blowing up balloons on the screen, came on don’t let them vanish away! you have just 60 second to pop all points! so focus on all your senses and on your extraordinary a sight!

Now get out all your power against the balloons! Came on hurry up!
Watch out the colours balloons, white give more points than the others.
Enjoy popping balloons the more you can!
